original_text: When he was about to enter Egypt, he said to Sarai his wife, “I know that you are a woman beautiful in appearance,
korean_text: 그가 애굽에 가까이 이르렀을 때에 그의 아내 사래에게 말하되 내가 알기에 그대는 아리따운 여인이라

sentences.original_text: When he was about to enter Egypt,
he said to Sarai his wife,
“I know that you are a woman beautiful in appearance,
